org.eclipse.ptp.launch

Class PTPLaunchPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractUIPlugin
      • org.eclipse.ptp.launch.PTPLaunchPlugin

  • public class PTPLaunchPlugin
extends AbstractUIPlugin
    The main plugin class to be used in the desktop.
